name: Counter Attack Shooting Games
description:
Dive into the best shooting game of 2018. You will start your career as Major Drake Spazts. Now you are deployed in the epic war zone to complete difficult tasks. Infiltrate the enemy occupied area and retrieve the stolen equipment.
Stop the terrorists and shoot n kill all the bad guys. Build your frontline strategy, make a team and then rush to the battlegrounds to stop criminals. You can pick team members for your counter terrorist squad, they can assist you while you are in combat.
Select heavy weapons or light machine guns , hand guns , assault rifle guns with heavy bullets, super sonic bullets of your choice.

Counter Attack-Survival Shooting is a fast paced fps shooter and tps shooter at the same time. Your duty is to lead the battle and become the best shooter across the globe.

Take action and survive on the frontline.

Features:

- Take the control of the battle and become the best shooter in the most addictive 3d sniper shooting game.
- Mission Counter Attack FPS Game Controls
- Sniping shooting simulation
- Bullet time, dodge them bullets.
- Driving in military vehicles.
- Legendary Longbow included.
- Killing and sniper simulation
- Extreme 3D graphics
- Real-time firing physics
- Competitive sniping missions
